author: Nick Turner
title: Starbucks Recalls Glass Tea Pitcher After Buyers Get Cut, Burned
text:
Starbucks Corp.’s Teavana is recalling a tea pitcher after receiving 50 reports of the glass breaking or leaking, leaving at least a few customers cut and burned.
People who purchased the Tristan Glass Pitcher, which is designed to brew and serve tea in the same container, can return it for a new pitcher and a $25 Teavana gift card, the company said in a statement on its website. Customers also can get a full refund instead.
The Teavana division, which is central to Starbucks’ effort to generate $3 billion in tea sales over the next five years, is working with the U.S. Consumer Product Safety Commission and Health Canada on the voluntary recall.
There were three reports of lacerations from the Tristan pitcher and two minor burns, Teavana said.
